user_query: I'm a journalist covering climate change and renewable energy. Can you assist me in finding articles from multiple sources and specifically from Sky News? Additionally, fetch climate change news from The Times. Also, provide me with some insights on the impact of climate change on energy prices in Europe.

TaskList.description: Fetch articles related to climate change from multiple news sources including Sky News.
Specifically fetch climate change articles from Sky News.
Fetch climate change news from The Times.
Provide insights on the impact of climate change on energy prices in Europe.
